sen.j: 御庭番（おにわばん）は江戸時代の第8代征夷大将軍、徳川吉宗が新設した江戸幕府の役職。
sen.e: The Oniwaban was a position in the Edo bakufu (the Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun) which created by Yoshimume TOKUGAWA, the eighth Seiitaishogun (the Shogun in charge of conquering barbarian territories) in the Edo period.
